title: I love this app

text: I was a little hesitant on signing up for Moneylion plus but my sister recommended it because she got approved for the $500 loan and got it instantly. When I signed up I was told to wait 30 days (which is totally fine and was expected). I'm guessing if you get denied they make you wait to build trust. Cool. Its been 30 days and I love how I was able to get the loan instantly no problems. I was confused on not being able to take out any investments whenever I wanted and that my payments were posting a week late every week. I gave it 4 stars because of how hard it is to reach customer service! I tried chatting with an agent 4 times and the first 3 times they take almost an hour to get back to you and close the chat right away if you do not reply. If I'm waiting one hour to chat, they can wait at least 10 minutes. My phone wouldn't get a notification when they reply. Anyways, I see a lot of bad reviews but I haven't had any real issues- the agent told me the investment account has to maintain a minimum of $150 and anything above that can be withdrawed. If you have a loan however- anything above the 150 + the loan amount (in my case $650) can be taken out. Again- totally fine because this company does give the benefit of the doubt. I didn't want to take money out but it was out of curiosity- and they said once you cancel the membership that full amount gets returned. I've been using Moneylion over a month and I'm praying there is no fraud involved. So far so good. Love the low interest rate for the loan and the speed! I'll post another review after I've reached $150 and paid my loan off!
title: I was a little hesitant on signing up‚Ä¶

title: THEY STEAL YOUR MONEY DO NOT JOIN

reply.message:
Hello Michael! 

All, customers with active Plus loans can withdraw from their investment account if the balance of the investment account is greater than the loan balance. However, they must still maintain the $150 minimum.

*Example:*
Loan Balance: $100
Investment Balance: $400

($400 - $100) - $150 minimum requirement = $150 available for withdrawal

text: This company is absolute garbage. I took out the 500 dollar loan and paid it off early. I called to cancel my membership and ask to liquidate my investment account. The guy said I will have my money in 7-10 business days. I call them 7 business days later to check up on my money. They say that no liquidation request was made (I made sure when talking to the guy originally that it would be liquidated and in my account in 7-10 business days). So I asked to speak to a supervisor who said he personally submitted the liquidation request and I would receive my money in 7-10 business days. I call them 7 business days later to check on the status and they tell me that the liquidation is in process and the money should be in my account in 3-5 business days. So I wait 5 business days and call today. The guy said that the liquidation is still in process and doesn‚Äôt know what is going on but he will send a message to the higher ups to see what is going on. It has now been a month since I originally canceled my account and still haven‚Äôt gotten my money. They‚Äôre just giving me the run-around like the other reviews I have read stated. Do yourself a favor and stay away from this trash company. I am going to report them to the correct agencies and I am going to take legal action. This is theft. Plain and simple. Stay away.
title: THEIVES. Stay away!!!

reply.message: Hi Greg - I am sorry to hear that your issue wasn't resolved the first time you reached out to us. We make sure our customer service agents are trained to address all customer inquiries the first time they call in. It looks as though you are experiencing a delay with receiving your investment account funds. The retrieval of these funds can take some time since there are several steps that need to take place. You can read more about this here https://moneylion.helpshift.com/a/moneylion-plus-1518215303/?p=web&s=moneylion-plus-investment-account&f=how-long-does-it-take-to-receive-my-money-when-i-make-a-withdrawal-from-my-moneylion-plus-investment-account&l=en

text:
First off, the customer service is HORRIBLE. If you have to call, be prepared to wait for a minimum of 10 mins. 22 mins the last time I called. 3 successful calls placed and about 12 attempts. I got tired of waiting or ran out of time many times. 

I can not get these folks to understand that I want the Plus fee deducted from my MoneyLion checking account. I closed my external account because I thought MoneyLion was a good deal but as other reviews have stated, ‚Äúif it sounds to good to be true...‚Äù (you know the rest). 

As of today I have called three different days and emailed once (with no reply whatsoever). The biggest problem is that since I am now behind on my payments (due to their negligence) and I am missing out on the $1 per day cashback. This essentially takes a ‚Äúno fee‚Äù checking account to one that‚Äôs charging a hefty penance. 

In addition, the time it takes for items to post is ridiculous and the external transfers take way too long. It‚Äôs 2018, ACH transfers should be completed the next business day. 

Save your time and pass on this one. The idea is great but the company has no idea how to actually execute it!
title: Closing my account after a month

reply.message: Hey Paul, we are sad to hear that you had a bad experience with MoneyLion, though we do appreciate the review.

text: I have to say from the start that this is an initial rating from me regarding my brief experience with trying to get setup with MoneyLion. The first issue I had was trying to get my bank account setup. The system kept insisting I was inputting the wrong routing number and I verified it with my bank more than once, so I switched to another one of my bank accounts. After that I made it to the part of the setup where it asks you to input a promo code in which the letter I received in the mail states that you get $10 bonus if you join before 12/5/2018. However, there is no promo code and when I called customer service the rep had no clue about the $10 bonus having a code if it wasn't on the letter. I could tell by her tone she was content with letting me go without trying to find out about it. She put me on hold and never came back to the phone. Another thing is that I can't say this is false advertising because it never states this anywhere in the brochure I received in the mail, but I was under the impression that when you signed up and pay the $29 membership you get to apply and get the $500 loan right away. I'm not a fan of the "Oh by the way clauses" that you're subject to run into with loan offers. But towards the end of the sign up it said that you have to prove your commitment for 30 days before getting access to the $500 loan. I hope someone replies to this posting and explain that and why it isn't stated on the brochure. So easy to think that the loan is immediate when it's not. Not everyone wants to wait 30 days for a $500 loan especially when there is a membership fee.
title: I have to say from the start that this‚Ä¶

reply.message: Hey James, we are sad to hear about the not so good experience you had with MoneyLion, though we do appreciate your review.

text: This is just another payday lender. I got a $500 loan from them in July 2018 and have been making payments of $121.93 each month since. $42.93 a month for loan payback, $79 a month for "membership" in this ridiculous scam. By the time I have fully paid off this $500 loan, I will have paid Moneylion over $1200. Do yourself a favor and go to a loan shark.
title: This is just another payday lender
